title: Bouncing Back After a Felony Conviction (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

When it's worth getting a financial coach,

Things to consider before changing careers,

Using a unified managed account,

Selling cars to get out of debt.


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
